content.content:
`.carts`

Use the **carts** resource to create, read, update and delete shopping carts in
a merchant's store, you can edit all cart properties and also work with all
cart subresources directly at this resource

meta.description: Whether cart still available to complete checkout
If the cart has been completed, generating an order
URL to this cart's page - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Optional URL specific to mobile devices - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Status defined by seller - Max length: **50**
UTM campaign HTTP parameters
Parameter "`utm_source`", the referrer: (e.g. google, newsletter) - Max length: **100**
Parameter "`utm_medium`", the marketing medium: (e.g. cpc, banner, email) - Max length: **100**
Parameter "`utm_campaign`", the product, promo code, or slogan (e.g. `spring_sale`) - Max length: **200**
Parameter "`utm_term`", identifies the paid keywords - Max length: **100**
Parameter "`utm_content`", used to differentiate ads - Max length: **255**
The website that the customer clicked on to come to the shop - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Code to identify the affiliate that referred the customer - Max length: **200**
If cart is originated from a gifts list, specify customer ID who will receive the gift - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
List of customers associated with this cart - Max elements: **3000**
Customer ID
Whether cart is available for other customers too (anyone)
Products composing the cart - Max elements: **3000**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Product ID - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
ID to specify the variation added to cart, if product has variations - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Product or variation unique reference code - Min length: **2** - Max length: **100** - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Za-z0-9-_.]+$`**
Product or variation full name, or other label for this cart item - Max length: **255**
Product or variation picture for this cart item
Image size variation
Image link - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
Item customization fields - Max elements: **100**
Customization field ID - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Title for this customization field, can be the grid title - Max length: **70**
Option chosen or created by customer
Identify option if it was predefined (not custom value created by customer) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]{2,30}$`**
Option text value displayed for the client - Max length: **70**
Option color palette (if the field involves colors), starting by main color - Max elements: **6**
RGB code with #
URL of file attached by customer to this field - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Price alteration due to this customization
Type of price addition
Additional value, could be negative - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
Gift wrap chosen by customer
Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore - Max length: **20** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
Title describing this gift wrap - Max length: **70**
Additional value due to this gift wrap - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **99999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
Item quantity in cart - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
Minimum item quantity for this cart - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
Maximum item quantity for this cart - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
True if product quantity should not be checked, using quantity specified for this item
Designator of currency according to ISO 4217 (3 uppercase letters) - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]{3}$`**
Graphic symbol used as a shorthand for currency's name - Max length: **20**
Product sale price specifically for this cart - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999** - Max precision: **0.00001**
Final item price including additions due to customizations and gift wrap - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999** - Max precision: **0.00001**
True if the product price should not be checked, using price specified for this item
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Flag title
The sum of all items prices - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999999** - Max precision: **0.00001**
Default discount to be applied
In which value the discount will be applied at checkout
Discount type
Discount value, percentage or fixed - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
List of orders completed with this cart - Max elements: **3000**
Order ID
List of custom attributes - Max elements: **100**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield - Max length: **30**
Field name - Max length: **50**
Custom property value - Max length: **255**
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Flag title
Optional notes with additional info about this cart - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/carts.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **required** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

meta.description: Max number of objects to return
meta.title: number

meta.description: First entry to return
meta.title: number

meta.description: Rules to order resultant objects
meta.title: string

meta.description: Object properties to return
meta.title: string

meta.description: Object property to query
meta.title: string

content.content:
*/carts.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/carts/cart-object)

*/carts/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **none**
_PATCH_, _PUT_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/carts/cart-object) For overwriting and editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but especially for edit requests there are no required fields

meta.description: The cart ID
meta.title: string
